Package player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
player.Player
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
Singletone class to keep track of everything related to the player and their progress. Health, score, gold and round. It is also able to hold player name if needed (like when saving score) Singletone to make it easier to access from various places in the program and make sure that there is only a single player.
Version:
7
Author:
Ã–mer, Robin, Mojtaba
